2017 / 2018 data
The following is a list of the 40 largest UK airports by total passenger traffic in 2018, from UK CAA statistics.[5]

Rank
2018[nb 1]	Airport	Total Passengers[nb 2]	Aircraft Movements[nb 3]
2017	2018	Change
2017 / 18	2017	2018	Change
2017 / 18
